title: Mark Cavendish ‘Project 35’ Gets Boost as Mark Renshaw Joins Astana as DS
content:
Renshaw spent almost a decade riding as Cavendish's leadout man and was an advisor for Astana-Qazaqstan during the 2023 Tour de France.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish ‘Project 35’ Gets Boost as Mark Renshaw Joins Astana as DS on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
